name: 68ed
body:
68ed
====

**68ed** is an editing environment designed to make working with Motorola's 68HC11 assembly language painless for beginners and students. You can use it [online](http://eightyeight.github.com/68ed/editor.html), or clone the [repository](https://github.com/eightyeight/68ed) and run it in your local environment.

**68ed** is based on the [ACE text editor](http://ace.ajax.org/).
